title: Bread and Banjo Bakery
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, Irish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Wife-and-husband run bakery cafe offering a few vegan choices which includes Malaysian curry puffs (pastry dough is made with coconut oil and infused with fresh turmeric), power energy balls, lunch salads and kale chips. The husband plays the banjo.
